body:
Followme.js is a presentation script based on Impress.js & Socket.io, lets your viewers follow your presentation no mater what device you have.

### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/snekkalapudi/followme.js.git
$ cd followme.js
$ npm install
$ node app.js

Now publish your public url: http://localhost:3000/

And control the presentation from any where from: http://localhost:3000/remote.html
tagline: Lets your viewer follow the presentation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Followme.js
